mapper.insert: insert into `ry-zzyl2`.reservation (name, mobile, time, visitor, type, status, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, remark) values (#{name},#{phone},#{time},#{visitor},#{type},#{status},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{creatBy},#{updateBy},#{remark})
mapper.select: select id,name,mobile as phone,time,visitor,type,status,create_time,update_time,create_by,update_by,remark from `ry-zzyl2`.reservation where mobile = #{phone}
select id,name,mobile as phone,time,visitor,type,status,create_time,update_time,create_by,update_by,remark from `ry-zzyl2`.reservation where status = 0 and time < now()
